```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(arrow)
library(janitor)

states_small <- c("CA", "FL", "IL", "IN", "MA", "NY", "PA", "TX", "WA")
synth_dir <- "data/synthea_phr_files"
synth_state_dirs <- paste0("output_", states_small)

```

## Resources

* Data dictionary for each CSV file: <https://github.com/synthetichealth/synthea/wiki/CSV-File-Data-Dictionary>

## Patients

```{r}
pat_df <- readr::read_csv("data/synthea_phr_files/output_CA/csv/patients.csv")
```

## Observations

```{r}
obs_df <- readr::read_csv("data/synthea_phr_files/output_CA/csv/observations.csv")
```

## Encounters

```{r}
encounters_df <- readr::read_csv("data/synthea_phr_files/output_CA/csv/encounters.csv")
```
